about_the_game:
3XTINCTION is an Online Co-op Top Down Shooter with tactical and strategic elements. After a series of experiments on spiders gone wrong, the world is devasted by an outbreak. Prepare yourself before every wave, buy weapons, ammos and set up turrets to stay alive. Each wave, the Infecteds are more and more numerous.

ONLINE COOPERATION

The game is fully playable online for 2 players. You and your friend will have to cooperate in order to complete missions.

CONSTRUCTIONS

Prepare yourself before every wave, buy constructions like turrets, decoy and barbed wires, place them freely on the levels !

CLASS SYSTEM

In 3XTINCTION Cooperation is key to survival, choose between 5 different class with unique skills and equipments.

UPGRADE YOUR WEAPONS

In case of zombie invasion, it's important to be well-armed! Use the money you've earned to buy new weapons and upgrade them.

SELECT YOU CHARACTER

Just because it's the apocalypse doesn't mean we can't have a good time! Use the money you've earned to unlock new stylish characters.

SKILLS SYSTEM

If you don't want to be ripped apart by zombies, think about upgrading your skills! Spend XP tokens earned to unlock new skills.

KEY FEATURES:

- Cooperative Online gameplay for up to 2 players.

- 8 different type of missions

- Use and upgrade more than 15 weapons to fight the outbreak.

- Complete missions in 7 different locations.

- Choose between 6 different class with unique skills.

- Solo game mode with BOTS

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Violence, strong language and General Mature Content.

name: 3XTINCTION

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 - 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel i5 or new-gen i3 / AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1650
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

reviews:
“3XTINCTION is a must-play for fans of shooter games.”
9/10 – Gaming Cypher

“3XTINCTION comes together really well. The blasting action on offer is simple but effective.”
4/5 – The Xbox Hub

“3XTINCTION is a remarkable Twin Stick Shooter, sublimated by a captivating apocalyptic atmosphere.”
19/20 – VideoLudos
short_description: 3XTINCTION is an Online Co-op Top Down Shooter with tactical and strategic elements. You and your friends will have to cooperate in order to complete missions.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain
*languages with full audio support
